name: JONES ADVENTURE
description:
This is a student project made in 2 weeks for one person.

It is a Puzzle-Plataformer  with isometric view where the main character is a explorer looking for a famous treasure that no ones con find already.

The real protagonist is the map, thats why the camera turns around of the center of the map. I hope you enjoy, it's the prototype of my current project and I hope I can show it soon.

You can play with gamePad or keypoard and mouse.
